name: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
desc: The identifier that reveals the type of property associated with a dynamic parameter.

items.name: static let hapticIntensityControl: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: A dynamic parameter to change the strength of a haptic pattern.

items.name: static let hapticSharpnessControl: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: A dynamic parameter to change the sharpness of a haptic pattern.

items.name: static let hapticAttackTimeControl: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: A dynamic parameter to change the time when a haptic pattern's intensity begins increasing.

items.name: static let hapticDecayTimeControl: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: A dynamic parameter to change the time when a haptic pattern's intensity begins decreasing.

items.name: static let hapticReleaseTimeControl: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: A dynamic parameter to change the time at which to begin fading the haptic pattern.

items.name: static let audioBrightnessControl: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: A dynamic parameter to change the high-frequency content of an audio signal.

items.name: static let audioVolumeControl: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: A dynamic parameter to change the volume or loudness of an audio signal.

items.name: static let audioPanControl: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: A dynamic parameter to change the pan of an audio signal.

items.name: static let audioPitchControl: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: A dynamic parameter to change the pitch of an audio signal.

items.name: static let audioAttackTimeControl: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: A dynamic parameter to change the time when an audio signal's amplitude begins increasing.

items.name: static let audioDecayTimeControl: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: A dynamic parameter to change the time when an audio signal's amplitude begins decreasing.

items.name: static let audioReleaseTimeControl: CHHapticDynamicParameter.ID
items.desc: A dynamic parameter to change the time when an audio signal begins fading.

items.name: init(rawValue: String)
items.desc: Creates a dynamic property ID from its raw string value.
